translations: 渡渡鸟，孤鸽；孤鸽科；过时的东西，迟钝的人

sentences.sentence: Mary sat up, and through the window she saw a dodo, an unusual dodo, right there in her yard!
sentences.translation: 玛丽坐了起来，透过窗户，她看到了一只渡渡鸟，一只不寻常的渡渡鸟，就在她的院子里！

sentences.sentence: "I lived over four hundred years ago," the dodo said.
sentences.translation: “我生活在四百多年前。”渡渡鸟说。
